1/13/25: Since the "mana discount on spells from graveyard" effect was added to Salvage Summoner, this felt like a unique opportunity to make the Stake better at feeding you more cards.
1/28/25: I am less interested in Mill with so many graveyard-matters effects present, and the unreliable nature of milling your own Lunge cards. But I love trinket hand-matters effects, so let's try the mill with that tacked on as an option.
12/11/25: Okay, lets try a mill version that can rescue your favorite cards, and get rid of relevant graveyard cards from the opponent.

cards.notes:
Riff on Mage Slayer, Jund creatures

2/7/25: Want to test a Deathbringer Thoctar version, the "each player sacs" line can sometimes be overwhelming. Ability "moved" from Conflux Hydra which now creates bonus tokens.
2/11/25: Tested an "exiled from library or graveyard" line for counters, which was too cute, and the synergy with Lunge is unnecessary for a Jund capstone, so the whole exile thing disappears. Actual Deathbringer Thoctar effect is miserable because of the way you can nickel and dime your opponent constantly with damage pings. Also tested "remove two counters from a single creature" just so that the floor was higher and you sometimes had to decide whether it was worth it to overdamage something, but that reads a bit complex. Trying out this version next.
10/30/25: Added a token sacrifice option
11/7/25: Totally redesigned again, this time with his sword Mage Slayer in mind. Added a doubled version of the Morbid trigger from other Jund creatures.
12/7/25: Tweaked a bit further, the damage trigger is now number of counters on each end step. Upgraded Ward to sac a creature.
12/22/25: Tweaked again. Now a Titanfight trigger.

“When the wielder is strong enough, any sword will do.”

Reprinted as Kresh, Deathbringer:
Whenever Kresh enters or attacks, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you contro. When you do, he deals 3 damage to any target.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Kresh this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Kresh. If it was dealt excess damage this turn, draw a card.
